body.name: RSH09 Cordless Vacuum Cleaners for Home, 22Kpa Stick Vacuum for Carpet Hardwood Floor Pet Hair, Lightweight Household Wireless Vacuum with LED Display, Up to 45Mins Runtime
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 30 mins
features: 🎁Long-Lasting Battery: This RSH09 vacuum is equipped with a 200W upgraded motor and a total 13200 lithium-ion battery, providing about 18 minutes of runtime in MAX mode and up to 45 minutes in standard mode.

🎁Reduce Hair Tangles: The V-shaped brush with soft and hard bristles makes it powerful for picking up pet hair, dust, and other messes. The internal comb design of the floor brush, like a hair-lifting groove, mitigates hair from attaching to the brush roller.

🎁Easy to Maneuver: Flexible 175° swivel sideways and 90° up and down. LED headlights assist in locating hidden dirt in dark areas and under furniture. The lightweight design and extended tube make it effortless to clean curtains, ceilings, and high areas. It also can easily convert into a handheld vacuum for cleaning sofas and cars.

🎁Muti-Suface Cleaning: Suitable for low-pile rugs, hardwood, marble, tiles and other hard floors. You can clean the whole house quickly. The combination brush is ideal for deep cleaning, while the crevice tool is great for reaching tight spaces and corners.

🎁Easy to Care: The LED display screen shows the remaining battery power, suction level, and fault alerts. Total of 3pcs washable inlet HEPA filters for easy replacement. The 0.8L dustbin can be easily empty and cleaned with a damp cloth (do not wash).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good one
reviews.reviewText: This Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is a nice found. I love it so much. It is great to keeping my room and house clean. It's got a 200W motor and a massive 13200 lithium-ion battery. It gave me enough time to clean the house. You know how annoying it is when pet hair gets all tangled up in the vacuum brush? This vacuum has a V-shaped brush with soft and hard bristles that makes it easy. It not only picks up pet hair but also dust and all kinds of messes. And here's the best part – the internal comb design of the floor brush acts like a hair-lifting groove, stopping hair from sticking to the brush roller. No more wrestling with the vacuum to get hair out!It can swivel 175° sideways and 90° up and down. That's like doing flips and cartwheels – but for a vacuum! The LED headlights help me spot hidden dirt in dark corners and under furniture. Plus, it's so lightweight, and the extended tube makes it a breeze to clean curtains, ceilings, and high places. Oh, and did I mention it can transform into a handheld vacuum? Perfect for cleaning sofas and even my car! From low-pile rugs to hardwood, marble, tiles, and other hard floors, this vacuum can handle it all. The combination brush is like is great great for deep cleaning. And when I need to reach those tight spaces and corners, the crevice tool swoops in to save the day. It's like having a whole cleaning squad in one machine! The LED display screen is like its own little command center, showing me the remaining battery power, suction level, and any faults. It's like having a status update on my cleaning mission! And get this – it comes with three washable filters. When they get dirty, I just pop them out and give them a good wash. The 0.8L dustbin is a breeze to empty, and I can easily clean it with a damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is made cleaning my home so much easier. The vacuum has a strong motor and a long-lasting battery, giving me about 18 minutes in high-power mode and up to 45 minutes in standard mode, which is enough to clean my entire house.One feature I love is the V-shaped brush that's great for picking up pet hair and dust without getting tangled. This is a big help as I have a dog at home. The internal comb design in the floor brush also prevents hair from wrapping around the brush roller.The vacuum is super easy to maneuver with a flexible 175° swivel and 90° up and down movement. The LED headlights are really helpful for finding dirt under furniture or in dark corners. It's lightweight and has an extended tube, making it easy to reach high places, curtains, and ceilings. It also converts into a handheld vacuum, which I use for my sofa and car.The LED display is handy for keeping track of battery power and suction level. It comes with 3 washable HEPA filters, and the dustbin is easy to empty and clean.Overall, this Vacuum Cleaner is efficient, versatile, and easy to maintain, making it a great tool for keeping my home clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Economical Version of a Great Sweeper Vac
reviews.reviewText: My wife found one of these for $400. Said that's what she wanted for Christmas. I'm thinking, for that kind of money we could own a Hoover! Or one of those robotic cleaners. But she said this design allows her to clean under the bed. Honestly, I don't think much about what's under the bed, but she's a bit obsessive about that sort of thing. When I found this one at less than half the price of the one she picked out, I convinced her to give it a try. I was pleasantly surprised when I had snapped it all together how well made this vac is. Its got plenty of suction and its the lightest vac I've had the pleasure to heft. With several attachments in addition to the regular wide mouth vac head, it will do window sills, curtains and gets way up under the furniture where the dust bunnies burrow. And it's rechargeable. The battery life depends on which of two speeds you want to run it on. The lower suction does a pretty good job and allows longer operating time. Oh, I almost forgot. It's got headlights! You wouldn't think that would be a big deal, but I was shocked how much additional debris shows up when you cast a light on the subject. She's happy, I'm happy, we're happy and I have some money left over to get her something she would really like. Like a fishing pole or a new pair of waders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Cleaning with a Touch of Modernity
reviews.reviewText: I have found the ultimate cleaning solution, and it's the 22Kpa Cordless Vacuum Cleaner! This vacuum is an absolute powerhouse, with its impressive suction power of 22Kpa, it picks up dirt, dust, pet hair, and crumbs effortlessly from both carpets and hardwood floors. The transition between different floor types is seamless, making the cleaning process ultra-smooth and highly efficient.The battery life is truly exceptional, lasting up to 45 minutes on a single charge, which is more than enough to cover my entire house. Not having to constantly plug and unplug is a massive plus.As a pet owner, I know the struggles of dealing with pet hair, but with this vacuum, it's no sweat. It lifts pet hair from carpets and furniture like a boss, making my home much more comfortable and allergen-free.The lightweight design is another great feature, making it easy to carry around and maneuver. Cleaning under furniture and around corners has never been easier.The LED display is a fantastic touch, providing useful information like battery life and suction mode. Additionally, the LED lights on the vacuum head illuminate dark spaces, ensuring no dirt is missed.The stick design and various attachments make it versatile for different cleaning needs. I can even use it to clean upholstery, curtains, and even my car interior.In conclusion, the 22Kpa Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is the ultimate choice for anyone looking for a powerful, convenient, and versatile cleaning tool. It has revolutionized my cleaning routine, making it more enjoyable and highly efficient. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a clean and tidy home!
